Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Authorizes additional paid leave for public employees who are absent on military duty
Summary: Authorizes additional paid leave for public employees who are absent on military duty up to sixty days or fifty-two working days.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to authorizing additional paid leave for public employees who are absent on military duty
